ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of MARGARET PURDY of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition, to hold office for a term of three years, effective May 29, 2021.
